name: 張玉鈍
objective:
本課程首先探討競爭優勢與生產系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、 競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。進而以精實思維(lean thinking)為基礎，探討實現精實企業體的方向及議題，包括精實之基本步驟:消除浪費、暢流、後拉、完善，精實思考架構:理念 流程、員工與事業夥伴、解決問題。 基礎工具如價值溪流圖(value stream mapping)等將用來案例實作。　　
In this course, we first cover the linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models. Topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. Then, the course will explore the approaches and issues of realizing lean enterprise based on lean thinking. Topics included are the basic steps to become lean and the framework of lean thinking. The basic steps to become lean are wastes removing, smoothing, pull and perfection. The framework of lean thinking is often depicted as the 4P model: philosophy, processes, partnership, and problem solving.  Basic tools such as value stream mapping will be introduced.
